title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: When trying to add a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key field blank while adding a localization key. 3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title or not.
